snippet.title: Gods vs Horrors - Announcement trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2994240/
Gods vs Horrors is a roguelike card auto-battler where you coordinate Gods to defend the Earth against Cosmic Horrors.
Recruit Gods from different mythologies, buff and upgrade them, arrange them in perfect formation, and create thousands of synergistic builds!
